The Shopify Prospector Extension Sales Tracker is free.

The Shopify Prospector Extension is a FREE tool that helps you quickly analyze your competitors' online stores, including Shopify.

Function Description:

Discover your competitor's best-selling products to dominate the niche.
Shopify Prospector Extension identifies your competitors' best-selling products, the most popular categories, and the daily sales volume, keeping you one step ahead of your competitors with ease.

Track your competitor's sales performance in real-time.
Track real-time sales status and orders with Live Orders.

Uncover hidden data from your competitors.
Keep an eye on competitors' store information, such as store name, theme name, and best-selling products. Discover and track competitor stores.

Track your competitors with the Shopify Prospector Extension for FREE now!

If you have any questions or needs, please contact us at atendimento@dropshipping-tools.com.
